change.item: Crosswalked to EpiDoc XML from both

div.p:
Year 4 of Marcus Aurelius Antoninus Felix Pius Augustus, Choiak 8. Paid to Ptolemaios, collector of crown taxes of Karanis (by) Aurelius EisidorosIsidoros, father unknown, four drachmas, 4 drachmas: Tybi 7 [x] drachmas
6 unreadable lines
a further four drachmas, 4 drachmas, likewise a further [x] drachmas:
Epeiph 28 a further four drachmas, 4 drachmas:
Mesore four (drachmas), 4 drachmas.
